title: Use The Formula to Compute
text: Given any parabola in the form $${ax}^2+bx+c$$, the axis of symmetry is the vertical line $$x=\frac{-b}{2} a$$.

title: Substitute The Value Into the Equation
text: $$a=-1$$, $$b=2$$, so $$x=\frac{-b}{2a}=\frac{-2}{2\left(-1\right)}=1$$. $$x=1$$ is the axis of symmetry.
